      <text:text xmlns:text="http://jazz.net/xmlns/alm/rm/text/v0.1" artifactRole="" type="Screen Field">
        <text:richTextBody>
          <div>
            <h:div xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
              <h:table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="width: 1009px; border-collapse: collapse; border-collapse : collapse; border-color : #696969; border-collapse : collapse; " id="_1441994072492" dir="ltr">
                <h:tbody>
                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border: 0.5pt solid black; width: 33px; height: 20px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072493">
                      <h:div id="_1533835580703" dir="ltr">
                        <h:span>Sl.No</h:span>
                      </h:div>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0.5pt 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: solid solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_979">
                      <h:span>Field Name</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0.5pt 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: solid solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_981">
                      <h:span>Field Types</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0.5pt 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: solid solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_983">
                      <h:span>Significance</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0.5pt 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: solid solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_985">
                      <h:span>Possible Values</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0.5pt 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: solid solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_987">
                      <h:span>Mandatory/Optional</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0.5pt 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: solid solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_989">
                      <h:span>Default Values</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                  </h:tr>
                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 33px; height: 40px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1486685495260">1</h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1486685495261">
                      <h:span style="font-size:9pt">
                        <h:span style="font-family:calibri,sans-serif">Renewal Notice exemption term</h:span>
                      </h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1486685495262">Number (3)</h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1486685495263">
                      <h:p style="margin-bottom:10.0pt;line-height:115%;text-autospace:none;" id="_1486685495259">
                        <h:span style="font-size:9pt">Flag to identify if the Renewal Notice to be issued for accounts in this product if the term is equal to or less than this number. Based on term basis for the product.        </h:span>
                      </h:p>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1486685495264"> </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1486685495265">Optional</h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1486685495266">blank</h:td>
                  </h:tr>
                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 33px; height: 40px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072494">
                      <h:span>2</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1007">
                      <h:span>Pre-Renewal Notice Flag</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1009">
                      <h:span>Dropdown</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1011">
                      <h:span>Flag to identify if the Pre-Renewal Notice to be issued for accounts in this product.</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1013">
                      <h:span>Yes</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1015">
                      <h:span>Mandatory</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1018">
                      <h:span>No</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                  </h:tr>
                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; height: 20px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072495">
                      <h:span>No</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                  </h:tr>
                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 33px; height: 51px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072496">
                      <h:span>3</h:span>

                      <h:span>Pre-Renewal Notice Days</h:span>
                    </h:td>

                      <h:span>Open text (3 Numeric)</h:span>

                      <h:span>Enter the number of days the notice to be generated before CD renewal</h:span>
                    </h:td>

                      <h:span>4</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1036">
                      <h:span>Post-Renewal Notice Flag</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1038">
                      <h:span>Dropdown</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1040">
                      <h:span>Flag to identify if the Post-Renewal Notice to be issued for accounts in this product. </h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1042">
                      <h:span>Yes</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1044">
                      <h:span>Mandatory</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1047">
                      <h:span>No</h:span>
                    </h:td>

                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; height: 20px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072498">
                      <h:span>No</h:span>
                    </h:td>

                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 33px; height: 51px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072499">
                      <h:span>5</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1051">
                      <h:span>Post-Renewal Notice Days</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1053">
                      <h:span>Open text (3 Numeric)</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1055">
                      <h:span>Enter the number of days, the notice to be generated after CD maturity</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1057">
                      <h:span>Numbers</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1059">
                      <h:span>Mandatory if ‘Post-Renewal Notice’ Flag is selected as Yes</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1061">
                      <h:span>NA</h:span>

                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 33px; height: 40px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072500">
                      <h:span>6</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1065">
                      <h:span>Maturity Notice Flag</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1067">
                      <h:span>Dropdown</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1069">
                      <h:span>Flag to identify if the Maturity Notice to be issued for the  accounts in this product. </h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1071">
                      <h:span>Yes</h:span>

                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="2" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1073">

                    </h:td>

                      <h:span>No</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                  </h:tr>
                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; height: 20px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072501">
                      <h:span>No</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                  </h:tr>
                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt; border-style: none solid solid; width: 33px; height: 51px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072502">
                      <h:span>7</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1080">
                      <h:span>Maturity Notice Days</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1082">
                      <h:span>Open text (3 Numeric)</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1084">
                      <h:span>Enter the number of days, the notice to be generated after CD maturity</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1086">
                      <h:span>Numbers</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1088">
                      <h:span>Mandatory if ‘Maturity Notice’ Flag is selected as Yes</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1090">
                      <h:span>NA</h:span>
                    </h:td>
                  </h:tr>
                  <h:tr>
                    <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="border-width: 0px 0.5pt 0.5pt 0px; border-style: none solid solid none; width: 163px; height: 20px; border-color : #696969; " id="_1441994072504"> </h:td>
                  </h:tr>
                </h:tbody>
              </h:table>
            </h:div>
          </div>
        </text:richTextBody>
      </text:text>
    </ds:content>
